Package io.github.futures4j

Class Futures.CombinedFuture<FROM,​TO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>
      • io.github.futures4j.ExtendedFuture<TO>
        • io.github.futures4j.Futures.CombinedFuture<FROM,​TO>
  • Type Parameters:
    FROM - the type of the results of the combined futures
    TO - the type of the result of this combined future
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompletionStage<TO>, Future<TO>
    Enclosing class:
    Futures
    public static final class Futures.CombinedFuture<FROM,​TO>
extends ExtendedFuture<TO>
    Represents a future that combines multiple futures into a single future.

    The CombinedFuture allows operations on the collection of combined futures, such as cancelling all combined futures together.

    • Method Detail

      • cancelAll

        public boolean cancelAll​(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)
        Cancels this future and all combined futures.
        Parameters:
        mayInterruptIfRunning - true if the thread executing this task should be interrupted; otherwise, in-progress tasks are allowed to complete
        Returns:
        true if this task is now cancelled

      • cancel

        public boolean cancel​(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)

        If the preceding stage has ExtendedFuture.isCancellableByDependents() set, the cancellation will also propagate to the preceding stage.

        Cancels only this combined view. Call cancelAll(boolean) to cancel the constituent futures as well.

        Specified by:
        cancel in interface Future<FROM>
        Overrides:
        cancel in class ExtendedFuture<TO>
        Parameters:
        mayInterruptIfRunning - true if the thread executing this task should be interrupted (if the thread is known to the implementation); otherwise, in-progress tasks are allowed to complete.
        Returns:
        true if this task was successfully cancelled; false if the task could not be cancelled, typically because it has already completed.

      • getCombinedFutures

        public Stream<Future<FROM>> getCombinedFutures()
        Returns:
        a stream of the combined futures
